ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Very challenging class but really teaches you a lot and worth it

I highly recommend the course for both IR and IPE students. Frankly given that IPE research can be quite technical and challenging, I think that it is very difficult if not almost impossible for students to master the material without taking a course of this sort. This is especially true for students aiming to take the field exams in either or both of the subfields. We wrote a number of field essays and got a lot of helpful feedback -- and I think this was very helpful preparation for the exams.For those that think that they want to do IPE research, this course is essential -- you get very good training in evaluating the literature and conducting independent research in IPE.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: taught me how to read research and empirical reports.
The course material is quite specialized: as mentioned above, the course provides great training in IPE research and a very helpful survey of the field for PE and IR students.
